description: Break down to fundamental truths, removing assumptions
output_pattern: assumption → fundamental truth → implications → new approach

description: Ask 'why' repeatedly to find root cause
output_pattern: problem → why1 → why2 → why3 → why4 → root cause
claim → clarifying question → assumption check → evidence request → implications

description: Organize into Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive categories
output_pattern: topic → categories → verify mutual exclusivity → verify completeness

description: Consider the opposite of what you want
output_pattern: goal → inverse (what would guarantee failure?) → avoid inverse → refined approach

description: Find parallel situations in other domains
output_pattern: current problem → find analog → map relationships → transfer insights
topic → stakeholder 1 view → stakeholder 2 view → synthesis
question → expert A opinion → expert B opinion → consensus/debate

description: Argue for and against a position
output_pattern: position → pro arguments → con arguments → synthesis
proposal → challenge 1 → defense → challenge 2 → refined proposal
system → red team attacks → blue team defenses → improvements
perspectives → common threads → unique contributions → unified view

description: Substitute Combine Adapt Modify Put Eliminate Reverse
output_pattern: idea → S: substitute? → C: combine? → A: adapt? → M: modify? → P: put elsewhere? → E: eliminate? → R: reverse?
current state → what if X? → consequences → opportunities

description: Combine unexpected elements from different genres
output_pattern: genre A + genre B → unexpected combinations → evaluate novelty
constraints identified → remove each → explore possibilities → bring back selectively

description: Inject random element for new connections
output_pattern: random word/image → forced connections → new ideas
desired outcome → how to guarantee failure → reverse each failure mode
topic → assign to locations → walk through palace → retrieve connections
white (facts) → red (emotions) → black (caution) → yellow (optimism) → green (creativity) → blue (process)
imagine failure → brainstorm causes → prioritize risks → mitigation
system → inject random failure → observe impact → improve resilience
normal case → minimum values → maximum values → null/empty → invalid inputs

description: What can go wrong will go wrong
output_pattern: feature → identify failure modes → probability × impact → mitigation
system → potential attackers → attack vectors → defenses
problem → branch A → evaluate → branch B → evaluate → prune → select best path
problem → step 1 reasoning → step 2 reasoning → ... → conclusion
problem → attempt 1 → attempt 2 → attempt 3 → compare → consensus
response → what assumptions did I make? → what did I miss? → confidence level
goal → what enables goal? → what enables that? → ... → first action

description: Move up and down abstraction levels
output_pattern: specific → abstract → more abstract → back down different path → new specific

description: What fantasy does the player want to fulfill?
output_pattern: player → desired fantasy → emotions wanted → mechanics that deliver
action → feedback → reward → motivation to repeat → refinement
aesthetics wanted → dynamics needed → mechanics required
achievers → explorers → socializers → killers → how feature serves each
current skill → challenge level → adjust for flow → avoid boredom/anxiety
action → visual feedback → audio feedback → screen effects → satisfaction
user → entry point → steps → pain points → moments of delight → exit
interface → visibility → match real world → user control → consistency → ...
visual impairment → hearing impairment → motor impairment → cognitive → solutions
current scale → 10x: what breaks? → 100x: what breaks? → solutions
component → depends on → depends on → single points of failure → redundancy
user action → CPU time → GPU time → memory → network → bottleneck → optimization
system → inputs → outputs → state → each: can attacker exploit?
main topic → tangent emerges → park it → continue main → revisit parked items
topic → set timer → explore → timer ends → synthesize → move on
claim → evidence strength → assumptions → confidence: high/medium/low
response → confirmation bias? → anchoring? → availability? → adjust
